Topic.Title: [SOLVED] Where is the lightness/darkness option in Quest 5.8

Posts.EditableText:
There use to be a Light/Dark  option under the 'features' tab for an object. This is missing in the latest version of Quest.
Has this option been moved to another park of this program?
Posts.HTML:
There use to be a Light/Dark option under the 'features' tab for an object. This is missing in the latest version of Quest.
Has this option been moved to another park of this program?

Posts.EditableText: There's an option to enable light/darkness on the features tab of the game element. Once that's enabled, it will appear on the features tab for each room or object.
Posts.HTML: There's an option to enable light/darkness on the features tab of the game element. Once that's enabled, it will appear on the features tab for each room or object.

Posts.EditableText:
Thanks mrangel, that solved the problem.
I didn't think this option would be left out of the game.
Posts.HTML:
Thanks mrangel, that solved the problem.
